import { useAuth } from "../context/AuthContext"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import {collection, getDocs, getDoc, deleteDoc, doc, updateDoc} from 'firebase/firestore' import { db } from "../firebase"; export function Home(){ const {user, logout, loading} = useAuth(); const [usuario, setUsuario] = useState({ email: '', password: '', name: '', birthDate: '', LastName: '', DNI: '', key: '', zone: '', riskFactor: '', doseAmountCovid: '', hasVaccineFlu: '', vaccinationDateFlu: '', hasYellowFever: '', doseYearYellowFever: '' }); const handleChange = ({target: {name, value}}) => { setUsuario({...user, [name]: value}); }; const handleLogout = async () => { await logout(); } /* const update = async (e) => { //e es un evento e.preventDefault() //para evitar comportamiento por defecto //const product= doc(db, "products", id) //traemos todos los datos a product //const data= {description: description, stock: stock} //obtenemos data const userRef = doc(db,`Persona/${user.email}`) //const snapshot = await getDoc(userRef) const data= {email: email, stock: stock} //console.log(snapshot.data().user.clave) await updateDoc(userRef, data) //la data son los datos actualizados, updateDoc es de firestore, para actualizar los datos } */ if(loading) return

loading

return
